Articles.Content:
(I think this is where I should post this. If not, will someone please correct me.)

Hello,

I'm mineaheadtv, an amatuer animator. Earlier today I completed this kerbal rig. I'ts very basic, and has no facial expressions. I plan to update it later as add more. However, I thought some of you might be able to use it, so I uploaded it here.

https://www.dropbox.com/s/1fg9tav7uakrmms/Kerbal-No-IK.blend

If you have any issues, or want to help me with this, let me know.

The model was made by rewdew, the guy who does the kerbal show. If anyone uses this for an animation please credit me for the rig and him for the model.

Pics:
Well, why don't you use his lastest (and very kerbal-looking) models instead?
I wasn't aware that he had any newer ones. Where can I find them?
If anyone knows how to fix the thumb's deformation issues, please let me know!
